data.title: Bridal Veil, OR
data.meta_description: Bridal Veil, Oregon - Current temperature and weather conditions. Detailed hourly weather forecast for today - including weather conditions, temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, dewpoint, wind, visibility, and UV index data.
data.text:
Weather forecast and temperature for today - Sunday, Aug 11.

6:05 am

8:22 pm

PDT

AM Clouds / PM Sun

79°F / 57°F

Wind: 6mph WSW

Humidity: 69%

Precip. probability: 4%

Precipitation: 0"

UV index: 7

On Sunday, in Bridal Veil, it will be cloudy in the morning. However, the sky will clear during the afternoon, and sunny weather is forecasted.

Temperature span will be from a high of a warm 78.8°F (26°C) to a low of a refreshing 57.2°F (14°C).

The predicted high temperature is set to match the regular peak of 79.7°F (26.5°C) in August.

Sunrise was at 6:05 am and sunset will be at 8:22 pm; the daylight will last for 14h and 17min.

Frequently asked questions

What is the current temperature?

The current temperature (7:58 am) is 64.4°F (18°C).

What is the weather forecast for Bridal Veil for today?

On Sunday, in Bridal Veil, it will be cloudy in the morning. However, the sky will clear during the afternoon, and sunny weather is forecasted.

What will be the highest temperature today?

Today, the maximum temperature will be 78.8°F (26°C), while the minimum temperature will be 57.2°F (14°C).

The maximum temperature will be in line with the average highest temperature of 79.7°F (26.5°C) in August. The lowest temperature will be relatively higher than the average low of 52.7°F (11.5°C).

What time are sunrise and sunset today?

On Sunday, in Bridal Veil, sunrise was at 6:05 am and sunset will be at 8:22 pm (PDT).

How long is the day today?

In Bridal Veil, Oregon, today, there will be 14h and 17min of daylight.
